state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! First step, open the hatch in the studio. After that, make an effort to take a trip south. Next, venture south. After that, move east. That done, try to head north. And then, go to the east. And then, try to move south. After that, travel south. Following that, head south. That done, travel east. Then, attempt to travel east. And then, move north. And then, attempt to venture west. With that over with, pick up the keycard from the floor of the steamy dish-pit. Got that? Good! -= Studio =- You find yourself in a studio. A standard kind of place. There is a closed hatch leading south. There is an open door leading east. > -= Studio =-0/1
